title: [Large-Scale] Knowledge Modeling-Based Collaborative Learning Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Domain Expertise (Medical/Legal/Technical Fields)
context.additional_context: Team-based mathematical modeling projects in BYOD environments with continuous formative feedback

learning_goals: Learners can construct three or more learning design templates using knowledge modeling tools based on the IMS-LD standard
Through peer evaluation and feedback during collaborative design processes, learners can improve their learning design proposals at least twice
Via math-based problem-solving projects, learners can complete one or more knowledge models linked to domain expertise (medical/legal/technical)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
